item.title: State Emergency Department
item.description: name: state_ed_report fullname: Text Analysis Interactive Dashboard description: >An automated Text Analysis Interactive Dashboard template. Original Code By: Michael Sheppard. Adapted to the Rnssp Package by: Gbedegnon Roseric Azondekon. National Syndromic and Surveillance Program (NSSP). Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). create_dir: true Detailed Description The state emergency department report template (state_ed_report) summarizes trend classification and ESSENCE alerting for the CCDD categories at the state and county level. Users can select percentages, counts, or percentages and counts for state and county-level time series.
